overview: A word spoken with the heart and not the vocal cords. The heaviest left in the world located at the end of Tahiti's coastline, contemplates a scenario that not only inspires respect, but imposes it. Inside Outside takes you to a place where reputation has been earned. And that's where the Billabong Pro 2008 is, going through the trials, the tow-in session, behind the scenes of the event, to the insane free surf session on impossible spots and benches. Music by MGMT, Disturbed, Donavon Frankenreiter, Midnight Youth, The Runners, My Secret Circus and Newton Faulkner, Inside Outside is an all-HD film made especially for you. Enjoy!
title: Inside Outside
